input.sentences: special visit from a location air force plane .
the playground on a cold winter day .
the house ready for christmas and new years .
the chair completely covered in snow .
finally went bowling all night long .
output.sentences: Many people love to visit a special air force plane on the outskirts of town.
An old playground stands still in the snow of winter each day.
A house stands ready for christmas.
A lawn chair stands completely covered in the snow.
When night finally rolls out, its time for bowling.
